citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 pm on 30-
MAR-22. Inspectors left a voicemail at the number on file, and waited for 30 minutes before leaving the property. During
that time a family member of the licensee was at the facility and stated that the licensee was unable to be reached for
inspection that day.
Additional Inspectors:
Mark Sanderbeck, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 pm on 30-

that time a family member of the licensee was at the facility and stated that the licensee was unable to be reached for 
inspection that day.
